body:
Hello!

I am happy to announce that Avicus will now be accessible during Mojang session server outages! 

You will be able to connect as long as your IP matches with one of that last 15 IPs you log in with. New users will not be able to connect during session downtimes.

This fix is deployed now so any future session outages shouldn't be an issue for our users.

Thanks,
ALM

title: Mojang Session Downtimes and Avicus

replies.body: Is this due to what just happened recently, or unrelated?

replies.body:
Ye, 15 IPs are way too much.

Technically if you would log in cracked as keenanjt and you have the same ip as he has/had (for some reason, maybe Funky uses the same VPN as you), could you join Avicus? {tag=c2a4c847653e482ab62ed7f8b64330cb} {tag=eb1216878b1a4944bd4de0a818d9dfe2}

replies.body: Not 15 IPs, the last IP(s) you logged in with the last 15 times.
